title: "Taiwan Semiconductor's Sales Are Down -- Even With the AI Boom"
excerpt: "Investors have bid up computer chip stocks such as TSMC this year on the back of the artificial intelligence (AI) boom, which requires an immense amount of computing power to train and run. The iShares Semiconductor ETF is up 47.5% in 2023, outpacing the S&P 500 's (still impressive) return of 19%."
